SqlResource.SelectOrderItems: SELECT * FROM dbo.OrderItems oi WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.Orders o WITH(NOLOCK) ON oi.Order_Id = o.Id AND oi.OrderType IN (0,1,2) @OrderType=oi.OrderType AND @Id=o.Id AND o.Id in @Ids OPTION(RECOMPILE)
SqlResource.SelectByChoose: select * from Orders o with(nolock) where 1 = 1 and Id = @Id and OrderNo = @OrderNo and BusinessTime >= '2022-8-1'
SqlResource.SelectByChooseAndIf: select * from Orders o with(nolock) where 1 = 1 and Id = @Id and OrderNo=@OrderNo and UserStatus = 1 and BusinessTime >= '2022-8-1'
